Property.name: pGLOBE
Property.HelpText: The global volume of the game, affects all categories Default is 100%.

Property.name: pMUSIC
Property.HelpText: The volume of Music from 0% (off) to 100% (Vanilla). Default is 76% and is closest to Dreamcast.

Property.name: pSFX
Property.HelpText: The volume of SFX from 0% (off) to 100% (Vanilla). Default is 42% and closest to Dreamcast.

Property.name: pVOICE
Property.HelpText: The volume of Voices from 0% (off) to 100% (Vanilla). Default is 68% and closest to Dreamcast.

Property.name: pGLOBE
Property.HelpText: The global volume of the game, affects all categories Default is 100%.

Property.name: pMUSIC
Property.HelpText: The volume of Music from 0% (off) to 100% (Vanilla). Default is 76% and closest to Dreamcast.

Property.name: pSFX
Property.HelpText: The volume of SFX from 0% (off) to 100% (Vanilla). Default is 75%, no match with Dreamcast is possible.

Property.name: pVOICE
Property.HelpText: The volume of Voices from 0% (off) to 100% (Vanilla). Default is 68% and closest to Dreamcast.

Property.name: pENAB
Property.HelpText: Adds 3D Directional Audio functionality into the SFX system!

Property.name: pSTRN
Property.HelpText: How one-directional a sound can get from 0% (off) to 100% (Very Strong). Default 80% and is a mix of noticable and realistic.

Property.name: pDIST
Property.HelpText: Fixes the distance calculations for sound in Chao World to match Dreamcast!

Property.name: pSLIDE
Property.HelpText: Fixes pitch calculations to match Dreamcast! Most weren't adjusted to the new engine, this fixes them!

Property.name: pMECH
Property.HelpText: After Dreamcast, some Mech SFXs got much louder and lost their pitch modulation. This option restores them!

Property.name: pRING
Property.HelpText: Fixes the Ring SFX not swapping ears every time you collect one, like DC and GCN!

Property.name: pMISC
Property.HelpText: Miscellaneous sound fixes! Like Tails' flying sound, Metal Harbor's rocket, and Mad Space's fireballs!
